page.title: 12A MODERN VIEW
page.content: The opened blinds reveal a wide view full of grass, hedges and trees, and on the near horizon houses stand underneath a pale blue sky. Glancing sideways to broaden my view the ugly sight of mounds of earth dominate and stand out. The huge earth eating machine quickly works its way through the soil, not caring what else it destroys in its path. A park is seen looking lonely, bare and desolate. The birds gliding on the breeze swiftly and proudly make their entrance into my view. My eyes see no poeple, no vehicles. The view seems so peaceful without them. But then an old woman slowly and painfully walks into view and the excavator begins again to chew the earth.
